name: Bu!
description:
We find ourselves in an incomprehensible place, alone. Our main task is to poke the demon inside, otherwise we will die. The player is given some time to complete the tasks in the scary house 3d, otherwise he will die...

Character Control : WASD 

Camera rotation : Mouse 

Pick up item : RMB

Sit down: Shift

 In the game, you need to find 7 bones to win.
